title: DevSecOps Culture for Regulated SaaS
summary: A practical talk on building secure-by-design engineering culture in regulated SaaS environments with auditability, compliance alignment, and frictionless DevSecOps practices.

title: AI-Driven Credit Analytics in Lending Platforms
summary: A session on how ML enhances credit analytics with explainable modelling, hybrid rule+ML patterns, and regulatory alignment for lending workflows.

title: Women-in-Tech Mentoring Circle
summary: A long-running mentorship initiative supporting women in technology through coaching, workshops, and leadership growth.
